summary: "Strange Case of Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde" is a scary story by Robert Louis Stevenson. It's about a lawyer, Gabriel Utterson, who looks into strange events involving his friend, Dr. Jekyll, and a criminal, Mr. Hyde. Jekyll seems good, but Hyde is evil and violent. The story shows that sometimes people can have two sides, one good and one bad. It's a classic piece of English literature and has influenced popular culture, with the phrase "Jekyll and Hyde" used to describe people with unexpected evil sides.
title: Strange Case of Dr Jekyll and Mr Hyde
